text: Large, colorful insects such as this blue Morpho deidamia (HÃ¼ber) were highly prized by early natural history collectors. Merian illustrated the insects on a branch of the Barbados Cherry, a plant native to Suriname.
title: Great Blue Butterflies and Red Fruits
